About me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

CodeIT

Intern Frontend developer

I've spent 9 months as a intern frontend developer working for CodeIT, a Belgrade digital agency, where I've learned basics in responsive web design, communication with clients, and making estimate assuptions about project completion time. I've used tools like Slack, Jira and Trello for project managment during my internship. During that time, I've made couple landing pages for numerous clients, created two custom CMS applications, and worked on optimising responsivness of their projects.

Twins Brand

Graphic designer

Twins Brand is marketing agency, and here I've worked here as a graphic designer. I've used tools like Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator and Corel Draw for creating numerous designs for press printing on T-shirts, coffee mugs, and more.
